channel.title: Brhadaranyaka Upanishad
channel.itunes:author: Swami Guruparananda
channel.itunes:subtitle: Vedanta talks in Tamil
channel.itunes:summary:
This is a vast Upanishad. All the Upanishadic ideas are dealt with in detail in this Upanishad. Shankaracharya's commentary for this Upanishad is also an elaborate one.
The entire collection of Swamiji's talks is available at the Poornalayam website.
channel.description:
This is a vast Upanishad. All the Upanishadic ideas are dealt with in detail in this Upanishad. Shankaracharya's commentary for this Upanishad is also an elaborate one.
The entire collection of Swamiji's talks is available at the Poornalayam website.
